products.title: iPhone 13
products.description: As part of our efforts to reach carbon neutrality by 2030, iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 mini do not include a power adapter or EarPods. Included in the box is a USB‑C to Lightning Cable that supports fast charging and is compatible with USB‑C power adapters and computer ports.
